tools.name: gemini_websearch
tools.description: Search the web using Gemini with Google Search grounding and return normalized results. Uses Google's grounding to provide factual, up-to-date web search results with proper source attribution. Supports optional language preference and requesting extra per-item fields.

source.description: Canonical source identifier (e.g., URL or domain).

publisher.description: Publisher/organization name if known; null otherwise.

image.description: Preview image URL if available; may be empty string.

tools.name: gemini_call
tools.description: Call Gemini model directly (without grounding) with a prompt and optional args, constraining the response to a provided JSON Schema. Uses the model's knowledge cutoff without real-time web search or grounding.

prompt.description: Instruction describing the task and expected output.

args.description: Arbitrary structured inputs the prompt may reference.

outputSchema.description: JSON Schema describing the expected output structure that Gemini should produce.

output.description: Model output that SHOULD validate against the provided input.outputSchema.
